entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 5:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: E 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
